title: Why was the Orange Essence gain lower by half?
body:
As stated in the title why was the Orange Essence gain from disenchanting skin shards lower by 50%? There was no change to either the cost of upgrading skin shards or the ways in which we can obtain skin shards.
This seems like a bigger travesty that the changes the Blue Essence(which in my opinion averages out to about the same gain just at milestones instead of a constant stream).
I mean there is no logical reason, nor has it been stated by Riot on why this decision was taken, can a Rioter shine some light on this decision?

replies.body: Everything is done to make players purchase more rp, just think about everything they brought in.

Hextech......wait that allows us to collect keys and chests to get free content (don't need to pay for it).
Honor.......no no that gives us the occasional honor capsule and also plays a part in end of season rewards for more free content.
Oh and don't forget the end of season rewards which rewards players based on their achievements. Or the reward every time we level up now. And all the free game modes, champion updates, reworks.......

Sure that's all nice, but it does not explain why the value of SKIN shards was lowered, the only real way to get them is by purchasing them with real money and a negligible amount obtain in Mastery Chest(which btw are different from RP Chest and have a lower rate for skins).
The change to Orange Essence feels wrong, people paid money for those skin shards and they are losing value for no stated reason, it just is, I can tell you that I personally won't purchase anymore Hextech crafting loot, it's mathematically inefficient to do so compared to purchasing what I like, before it was random, sure, but mathematically you were getting marginally more than you would by picking and choosing what to purchase specially in special events.

Honestly I don't understand why anyone would pay for Hextech loot. The reduced value to Orange Essence is probably my only complaint. And I am sure that if its a big enough problem Riot will adjust the numbers. Just tired of the constant hate towards Riot.

Sure they screw up sometimes, but they actually offer quite alot to players for free. This is a business and the whole point is to be profitable. So as long as I can load into a match have fun and slowly grind to get more free stuff I will be satisfied. 

Dont get me wrong, I am sick of the way micro transactions and dlc work in games these days. I miss the times when I could buy an awesome complete game and just enjoy it. Now half the stuff is locked behind loot crates, dlc that comes out the day of the main release. It sucks. But League is little different, you aren't forced to spend. Anyway there is my rant lol.

Then you agree with me, my only complain is Orange Essence reduction, that seem explicitly made to make Loot Boxes less RP efficient which seems crazy to me, they SHOULD(and were) be more RP efficient than outright buying what you want, because you're getting random stuff and are not guaranteed to even get something you like.
I purchased A LOT of Hextech crafting stuff and obviously I disenchanted everything I didn't like before the patch, so the changes didn't make me lose any current value however I can assure you the changes will discourage me from buying anymore.
Which is kind of my point, it feels like a change design to make people purchase more loot boxes than they would otherwise need but business wise I can't see this working out the way Riot seem to expect.

I agree with you.

As someone who owns and plays a lot of champions, the hextech skin shards were perfect for me. Basically much cheaper skins and I like collecting random skins especially if manage to get them for cheaper.

However, as you stated, if you purchase the orbs or boxes, it's even harder to then even be able to enchant those shards. Where as before you could spend like 20 bucks on 10 orbs and still easily profit in orange essence shard worth. Now that isn't possible due to such a low amount of Orange Essence gotten from the shards.

I was in support of shards/orbs/boxes, but I will not be spending more money on them if the orange essence isn't reverted back to normal. It's simply not worth it anymore.
